long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a convenient option to save images directly as PNG from the right-click menu.

The extension converts the image to PNG format before showing the "Save As" dialog.

WebP, a format developed by Google, offers smaller file sizes but is not yet widely supported across all platforms. By converting images to PNG, you can ensure compatibility with most image editing tools and easily upload them to sites like Imgur.

This feature simplifies the process by allowing you to save images in the more universally accepted PNG format without additional steps, making it quicker and easier to work with images across various applications and platforms.
